description:
Akari and Jiro each hear a rumor that Shiori and Minami won’t be switching pairs even though they’re A rank. Jiro asks Shiori if she plans to stay by Minami’s side forever. Meanwhile, Akari runs into Minami, who suddenly pulls her close to him and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hero, but Not the Main Character.
Plus qu`un héros, mais pas un protagoniste.
勇者以上, 主人公未満.
